mesquite.lib

Class MesquiteColorTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.MesquiteColorTable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategColorTable, ContColorTable, DNAColorTable, ProteinColorTable

    public class MesquiteColorTable
extends java.lang.Object
    This establishes and curates color tables for character states for use in shading etc. Eventually facilitities should be provided for changing the colors, and distinct tables for categorical and continuous states, and perhaps even distinct tables could be allowed at each character
